message.body: I don't fully remember how to do it. You need to match it up with one of the formulas.
Like...you know Ck for some k, so you can rearrange the equation to isolate x(n)
ok got it. are u busy these days btw? oh also do you thnk he might give us to draw signals or.write the equation for a.gven signal?
Oh My God!! if he gives that type of question im screwed. i dont understand to do them. u wont be coming on campus.by anychance?
I'm on campus for work on W and R.
what time? can i meet you or something lol ?
I have work from 1 to 6 tomorrow. Pick a time.
u tell me whatever time is.best an easy for you. the earlier the better. i have so much to ask if u have time lol
Let's meet at 11:30ish tomorrow at Bossone.
